articles.content:

articles.title: ‘India not our enemy’: Danish Kaneria hits back at Shahid Afridi over his ‘religious sentiments’ remarks - The Indian Express
articles.description: When I raised my voice against forced conversion, I was threatened that my career would be destroyed, says Kaneria.
